title: Tim Kaine Fired 5 State Police Chaplains for Praying in Jesus’ Name?
subtitle: Several Virginia state troopers resigned as volunteer chaplains in 2008 because of a departmental rule requiring that prayers at public events be nondenominational, but no one was fired.
author: David Emery
vclaim: As Governor of Virginia, Tim Kaine fired five state police chaplains for praying in Jesus' name.
